name: Mahjong II (Full)
description:
Remove all tiles from the tower, again! All-new towers in this sequel to our Mahjong game! Your goal is to match and remove all tile pieces from the tower. Enjoy three game modes - Classic, Time Attack and Challenge.

Full version without advertising.

• Classic game mode: play as long as you want!
• Time Attack mode: play against time!
• Challenge mode: each move is timed; the faster you choose, the bigger your bonus for the move!
• Unique tower layouts.
• Large tiles are easy to move.

Google Play Games: multiplayer, leaderboard and achievements!
